attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044

Please do not raise the fees for immigration of a child. International
adoption is very costly for families. Children deserve to have families and the
US Government should do everything in it's power to help that happen. There are
plenty of other immigration services that could be considered for fee increase.
Most people come to america selfishly for a better lifestyle than they have in
in their own country. US citizens adopting abroad, however are giving
selflessly for their adopted children to provide the love of a family.

Please re-consider the increase of immigration fees for adoption. By keeping
these fees to a minimum you help make it possible for orphan children to find
their forever families.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Cristine Brouillette
